item.title: Adjacent
item.description:
These are melee weapons, you need to be next to the target to be within range.

Adjacent Weapons

  • Battleax
item.content:
These are melee weapons, you need to be next to the target to be within range.

Adjacent Weapons

  • Battleax

item.title: Ax
item.description:
A weapon with a short handle and a flat ax head in one or more directions. The ax archetype encompasses throwing axes/hatches, battle axes, woodcutting axes, etc. This archetype does not include polearms with ax heads or cleaver knives.

Ax Weapons

  • Battleax
item.content:
A weapon with a short handle and a flat ax head in one or more directions. The ax archetype encompasses throwing axes/hatches, battle axes, woodcutting axes, etc. This archetype does not include polearms with ax heads or cleaver knives.

Ax Weapons

  • Battleax

item.title: Battleax
item.description:

1d8 3 Adjacent Ax -
item.content:

item.title: Close
item.description: These are generally thrown weapons, they can be used within a close range. If specific positioning is needed close range weapons can be used within 20 to 60 feet.
item.content: These are generally thrown weapons, they can be used within a close range. If specific positioning is needed close range weapons can be used within 20 to 60 feet.

item.title: Extreme
item.description: These are generally unlimited ranged weapons. They can target anything that the actor can see.
item.content: These are generally unlimited ranged weapons. They can target anything that the actor can see.

item.title: Long
item.description: These are generally ranged weapons that are designed for battle/war type engagements. If specific position is needed long range weapons can be used within 80 to 320 feet.
item.content: These are generally ranged weapons that are designed for battle/war type engagements. If specific position is needed long range weapons can be used within 80 to 320 feet.

item.title: Short
item.description: These are generally ranged weapons that are designed for skirmish type engagements. If specific positioning is needed short range weapons can be used within 30 to 120 feet.
item.content: These are generally ranged weapons that are designed for skirmish type engagements. If specific positioning is needed short range weapons can be used within 30 to 120 feet.
